ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Rainbow trout 170 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C (95% confidence limit 120-230 ug/l), wt 1.2 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 99%/

LC50 Fathead minnow 2200 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 1590-3040 ug/l), wt 0.9 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 99%/

LC50 Channel catfish 29 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 22-37 ug/l), wt 1.2 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 99%/

LC50 Bluegill 850 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 550-1300 ug/l), wt 0.9 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material, 99%/

LC50 Rainbow trout 310 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C (95% confidence limit 250-390 ug/l), wt 1.0 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Wettable powder, 50.%/

LC50 Fathead minnow 1900 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 1430-2530 ug/l), wt 0.5 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Wettable powder, 50%/

LC50 Channel catfish 28 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 21-34 ug/l), wt 1.2 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Wettable powder, 50%/

LC50 Bluegill 1200 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 900-1590 ug/l), wt 0.6 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Wettable powder, 50%/

LC50 Rainbow trout 370 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C (95% confidence limit 268-510 ug/l), wt 0.2 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Methyl-2-benzimidazole carbamate, 99%/

LC50 Channel catfish 16 ug/l/96 hr @ 22 °C (95% confidence limit 11-23 ug/l), wt 0.8 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Methyl-2-benzimidazole carbamate, 99%/
Effect of benomyl on nitrification by Nitrobacter agilis 0 ppm: 289.5 ug/nitrite/ml/0 days; 10 ppm: 444.2 ug nitrite/ml/513.2 days; 100 ppm: 444.2 ug nitrite/ml/440.5 days.
Effect of benomyl on nitrification by Nitrosomonas sp: 0 ppm: 3.8 ug nitrite/ml/108 days; 10 ppm; 2.0 ug nitrite/ml/2.1 days; 100 ppm: 1.7 ug nitrite/ml/2.0 days.
LC50 Coturnix >5000 ppm, 5 day; no overt signs of toxicity to 5000 ppm.
LC50 Mallard duck oral, 8 day >5000 ppm
LC50 Bobwhite Quail oral, 8 day >5000 ppm
